Simple Blinking LEDs

A simple circuit that blinks the two series LEDs every second.

The code used:

#define LEDPIN 13

void setup() {
  pinMode(LEDPIN, OUTPUT);
}

void loop() {
  digitalWrite(LEDPIN, HIGH); // ON
  delay(1000); // Sleep for 1000 ms
  digitalWrite(led, LOW); // OFF
  delay(1000); // Sleep for 1000 ms
}
